tools.name: create_or_update_file
tools.description: Create or update a single file in a GitHub repository

path.description: Path where to create/update the file

branch.description: Branch to create/update the file in

sha.description: SHA of the file being replaced (required when updating existing files)

tools.name: search_repositories
tools.description: Search for GitHub repositories

perPage.description: Number of results per page (default: 30, max: 100)

tools.name: create_repository
tools.description: Create a new GitHub repository in your account

private.description: Whether the repository should be private

tools.name: get_file_contents
tools.description: Get the contents of a file or directory from a GitHub repository

path.description: Path to the file or directory

tools.name: push_files
tools.description: Push multiple files to a GitHub repository in a single commit

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

tools.name: create_pull_request
tools.description: Create a new pull request in a GitHub repository

head.description: The name of the branch where your changes are implemented

base.description: The name of the branch you want the changes pulled into

draft.description: Whether to create the pull request as a draft

maintainer_can_modify.description: Whether maintainers can modify the pull request

tools.name: fork_repository
tools.description: Fork a GitHub repository to your account or specified organization

organization.description: Optional: organization to fork to (defaults to your personal account)

tools.name: create_branch
tools.description: Create a new branch in a GitHub repository

from_branch.description: Optional: source branch to create from (defaults to the repository's default branch)

tools.name: list_commits
tools.description: Get list of commits of a branch in a GitHub repository

tools.name: list_issues
tools.description: List issues in a GitHub repository with filtering options

tools.description: Update an existing issue in a GitHub repository

tools.description: Add a comment to an existing issue

tools.description: Search for code across GitHub repositories

tools.description: Search for issues and pull requests across GitHub repositories

tools.description: Search for users on GitHub

tools.description: Get details of a specific issue in a GitHub repository.

tools.name: get_pull_request
tools.description: Get details of a specific pull request

tools.name: list_pull_requests
tools.description: List and filter repository pull requests

state.description: State of the pull requests to return

head.description: Filter by head user or head organization and branch name

tools.name: create_pull_request_review
tools.description: Create a review on a pull request

commit_id.description: The SHA of the commit that needs a review

body.description: The body text of the review

path.description: The relative path to the file being commented on

position.description: The position in the diff where you want to add a review comment

line.description: The line number in the file where you want to add a review comment

comments.description: Comments to post as part of the review (specify either position or line, not both)

tools.description: Merge a pull request

commit_title.description: Title for the automatic commit message
